nodes.text: Star Wars Use the Force!: Discover what it takes to be a Jedi
Star Wars: Use the Force!: Discover what it takes to be a Jedi! is a Children's reference book regarding the Jedi way. It was published on May 28, 2020.
So, you want to learn what it takes to be a Jedi? Are you sure?

The Star Wars galaxy can be a dangerous place and becoming a Jedi is not all about using the Force, duelling with lightsabers, lifting X-Wings with your mind or defeating Darth Vader. Younglings will also need dedication, discipline and training-a lot of training-to rise to the lofty heights of Jedi Master. A sharp sense of humour also helps. It's necessary just to survive the training, never mind battling the Sith or the First Order.

Star Wars: Use the Force takes you on a thrilling, fact-filled and fun journey that shows what it really takes to be a Jedi. Join Jedi Younglings on a Kyber Crystal hunt, discover the dos, don'ts and maybes of lightsaber combat, and see what happens when good Jedi go bad. Learn the secrets and shortcuts on the path from Youngling to Jedi Master.

The perfect gift for young kids, Star Wars: Use the Force is a playful and informative guide to all things Jedi, featuring fun facts from the Star Wars movies and TV series alongside hilarious cartoons, and tips and (mind) tricks for wannabe Jedi Knights. In the Star Wars galaxy there's never a dull moment-just like Star Wars: Use the Force.
